body:
Comment 3: 
Would this be simple commands like hg update v1.0.0 or equivalent? 

Seems like it could be a fairly wide topic for an FAQ. Once people start checking out
tags, they'll want some sort of revision locking to keep the team in sync. Once multiple
projects are in the works, people will want the versions for one project to differ from
the next. Lots of people are trying different things and building different tools, and
there is still a lot of room to explore.

So while I think it's great to recognize the question, I'm not sure what the answer is.
Curious where this goes.
